title: Spore-DOB-0
description: The Spore Protocol stores value in Cells, while the Spore DOB Protocol Family built on this by interpreting and combining these Cells. The family includes protocols like DOB/0, DOB/1 or DOB/2. Spore DOB-0 is the first implementation, specifing the configuration method and interface format for decoders and providing a universal decoder to simplify development.
